attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In this time of 'multi-cultural' society and diversity, we appear to have had every other religion and culture forced upon us to the detriment of our own beliefs and values. Christmas is not just a British celebration but a global event that is held in every country in the world. Therefore, the status of Christmas should be left as it is.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
